to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: I'm being genuinely serious, Twilight fans, punish them.
sentences.chinese: 我很認真，粉絲們，這些不法分子必須得到懲罰。

sentences.english: The mystery that eludes all but the outlaws .
sentences.chinese: 神祕的，但看不到所有的不法分子。

sentences.english: Those who have more unique usernames are more vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 用戶名越是獨特就越容易受到不法分子的攻擊。
